author: Arthur C. Clarke
quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
test-quote: Two possibilities exist: Either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
test-quote: Nothing disturbs me more than the glorification of stupidity.

author: Lewis Carroll
quote: Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.
test-quote: One of the deep secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.
